movieData.name: Sherlock
movieData.description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

movieData.name: The Hunger Games
movieData.description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

movieData.name: Logan
movieData.description: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

movieData.name: Doctor Strange
movieData.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

movieData.name: The Fault in Our Stars
movieData.description: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.
